text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi allahapudhe (khari ani) nikhalasa maphi maga. Sambhavatah tumacya palanakartyane tumaci duskarme mitavavita. Ani tumhala asa jannatamadhye dakhala karave jicya khali pravaha vahata aheta. Jya divasi allaha paigambarala ani imana rakhanaryanna, je tyancyasobata aheta apamanita karanara nahi. Tyance divya teja (nura) tyancya pudhe ani tyancya ujavikade dhavata asela. He du'a (prarthana) karata asatila ki he amacya palanakartya! Amhala sampurna teja (nura) pradana kara ani amhala ksama kara. Nihsansaya, tu pratyeka gostice samarthya balaganara ahe
